LanguageData.MakeAntidoteSimple.label: Make simple antidote
LanguageData.MakeAntidoteSimple.description: Make simple antidote from poison gland. Produces 1.
LanguageData.MakeAntidoteSafe.label: Make safe antidote
LanguageData.MakeAntidoteSafe.description: Make safe antidote from poison gland. Produces 1.
LanguageData.EnterBasicAntidote.label: Remove poison
LanguageData.EnterBasicAntidote.description: Removes poison from the body. New poison can come from poisoned wounds.
LanguageData.CurePoisonArrow.label: Cure poison arrow hit
LanguageData.CurePoisonArrow.description: Completely heals a poisoned arrow hit
LanguageData.CurePoisonScratch.label: Cure poison scratch
LanguageData.CurePoisonBite.label: Cure poison bite
